descr: "A set of healthcare-related information that is assembled together into a single logical document that provides a single coherent statement of meaning, establishes its own context and that has clinical attestation with regard to who is making the statement. While a Composition defines the structure, it does not actually contain the content: rather the full content of a document is contained in a Bundle, of which the Composition is the first resource contained."

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "This list of codes represents the main clinical acts, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented. In some cases, the event is inherent in the typeCode, such as a \"History and Physical Report\" in which the procedure being documented is necessarily a \"History and Physical\" act."

fields.name: period
fields.descr: "The period of time covered by the documentation. There is no assertion that the documentation is a complete representation for this period, only that it documents events during this time."

fields.name: detail
fields.descr: "The description and/or reference of the event(s) being documented. For example, this could be used to document such a colonoscopy or an appendectomy."
